citation.article-title: Screening for endophytic nitrogen-fixing bacteria in Brazilian sugar cane varieties used in organic farming and description of Stenotrophomonas pavanii sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Stenotrophomonas pavanii sp. nov.
Stenotrophomonas pavanii (pa.va′ni.i. N.L. gen. n. pavanii of Pavan, named in honour of the Brazilian geneticist Crodowaldo Pavan).
Cells are Gram-negative and non-motile and do not form spores.
Growth is observed at 20–37 °C (but not at 4 or 40 °C), at pH 5–12 (but not at pH 4 or 13) and with 0.7–3 % NaCl (but not with 4 % NaCl).

Positive for assimilation of aesculin and citrate, but negative for assimilation of acetoin, glucose, mannitol, inositol, d-sorbitol, rhamnose, sucrose, melibiose, amygdalin, arabinose, glycerol, erythritol, d- and l-arabinose, d-ribose, d- and l-xylose, d-adonitol, methyl β-d-xylopyranoside, d-galactose, d-glucose, d-fructose, d-mannose, l-sorbose, l-rhamnose, dulcitol, d-mannitol, methyl α-d-mannopyranoside, methyl α-d-glucopyranoside, N-acetylglucosamine, arbutin, salicin, cellobiose, maltose, lactose, melibiose, sucrose, trehalose, inulin, melezitose, d-raffinose, starch, glycogen, xylitol, gentiobiose, turanose, d-lyxose, d-tagatose, d- and l-fucose, d- and l-arabitol, potassium gluconate, potassium 2-ketogluconate and potassium 5-ketogluconate.

Positive for esterase, trypsin, β-glucosidase, valine arylamidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, β-galactosidase, lysine decarboxylase, tryptophan deaminase, gelatinase, Tween 80 and DNase, but negative for α-chymotrypsin, urease, ornithine decarboxylase, arginine dihydrolase and cystine arylamidase.
The major fatty acids are iso-C15 : 0, anteiso-C15 : 0, summed feature 3 (comprising C16 : 1ω7c and/or C16 : 1ω6c) and C16 : 0.
The G+C content of the type strain is 67.5 mol%.
The type strain, ICB 89T ( = CBMAI 564T = LMG 25348T), was isolated from stems of sugar cane variety SP80-1842.
